description_texts.en: Gain +2% critical hit chance. If your next attack is critical, deal +100% more damage and spawn coins.

获得 +2% 暴击率。
如果你的下一次攻击暴击，
造成额外 +100% 伤害并生成金币。

description2_texts.en: Gain +2% critical hit chance. If your next attack is critical, deal +200% more damage and spawn more coins.
description2_texts.zh:

造成额外 +200% 伤害并生成更多金币。

abilities.description: Deal 1 damage to a unit within five tiles. If this kills it, gain 5 mana.
abilities.description_2: Deal 1 damage to any unit. If this kills it, gain 5 mana.

description_texts.en: Deal 1 damage to a unit within five tiles. If this kills it, gain 5 mana.
description_texts.zh:
对五格范围内的单位造成 1 点伤害。

如果击杀该单位，
获得 5 法力值。

description2_texts.zh:
对任意单位造成 1 点伤害。
如果击杀该单位，
获得 5 法力值。

abilities.description:

Allies gain the bonus ability Donate Energy+ until you throw it.
description2_texts.zh:
开始聚集元气弹。
该技能变为投掷元气弹。
在投掷前，所有盟友获得额外技能奉献能量+。

abilities.description:
Throw the Spirit Bomb, then this ability becomes Charge Spirit Bomb.
[s:.7](Cannot be thrown with 0 charges.)[/s]

description_texts.en:
Throw the Spirit Bomb, then this ability becomes Charge Spirit Bomb.
[s:.7](Cannot be thrown with 0 charges.)[/s]
description_texts.zh:
投掷元气弹，
然后此技能变为蓄力元气弹。
[s:.7](积蓄为0时无法投掷。)[/s]

abilities.description: Give +1 damage to the Spirit Bomb!
abilities.description_2: Give +2 damage to the Spirit Bomb!

description_texts.en: Give +1 damage to the Spirit Bomb!
description_texts.zh: 给予元气弹 +1 伤害！

description2_texts.en: Give +2 damage to the Spirit Bomb!
description2_texts.zh: 给予元气弹 +2 伤害！

abilities.description:
A one-hit kill punch. Gain All Stats Down on use.
This deals 25 damage to bosses instead of killing them.
[s:.7](Castable once per battle.)[/s]
abilities.description_2:
A one-hit kill punch. It causes a cone of wind that deals 5 damage. Gain All Stats Down on use.
This deals 25 damage to bosses instead of killing them.
[s:.7](Castable once per battle.)[/s]

description_texts.en:
A one-hit kill punch. Gain All Stats Down on use.
This deals 25 damage to bosses instead of killing them.
[s:.7](Castable once per battle.)[/s]
description_texts.zh:
一击必杀的一拳。
使用时获得全属性下降。
这对Boss造成25点伤害，
而不是秒杀。

description2_texts.en:
A one-hit kill punch. It causes a cone of wind that deals 5 damage. Gain All Stats Down on use.
This deals 25 damage to bosses instead of killing them.
[s:.7](Castable once per battle.)[/s]
description2_texts.zh:
一击必杀的一拳。
造成一个锥形风击，造成5点伤害。
使用时获得全属性下降。
这对Boss造成25点伤害，
而不是秒杀。

abilities.description: A weak melee attack that hits an extra time for each empty armor slot you have.
abilities.description_2: A weak melee attack that hits two extra times for each empty armor slot you have.

description_texts.en: A weak melee attack that hits an extra time for each empty armor slot you have.
description_texts.zh:
一个弱的近战攻击，
根据你空着的装备槽数额外攻击一次。

description2_texts.en: A weak melee attack that hits two extra times for each empty armor slot you have.
description2_texts.zh:
一个弱的近战攻击，
根据你空着的装备槽数每次额外攻击两次。

abilities.description:
Fire a magic blast at a unit within 5 tiles. Requires line of sight.
[s:.7](Castable once per battle. If all your armor slots are empty, castable once per turn.)[/s]
abilities.description_2:
Fire a magic blast at a unit anywhere within your line of sight.
[s:.7](Castable once per battle. If all your armor slots are empty, castable once per turn.)[/s]

description_texts.en:
Fire a magic blast at a unit within 5 tiles. Requires line of sight.
[s:.7](Castable once per battle. If all your armor slots are empty, castable once per turn.)[/s]
description_texts.zh:
向距离5格内的单位释放魔法冲击。

需要在视线内。
[s:.7](每场战斗可施放一次。如果所有装备槽均为空，每回合可施放一次。)[/s]

description2_texts.en:
Fire a magic blast at a unit anywhere within your line of sight.
[s:.7](Castable once per battle. If all your armor slots are empty, castable once per turn.)[/s]
description2_texts.zh:
向视线范围内的任何单位释放魔法冲击。

[s:.7](每场战斗可施放一次。
如果所有装备槽均为空，
每回合可施放一次。)[/s]

abilities.description: Move one tile and gain +1 [img:shield].
abilities.description_2:
Move one tile and gain +1 [img:shield].
This spell costs 0 mana the first time you cast it each turn.

description_texts.en: Move one tile and gain +1 [img:shield].
description_texts.zh: 移动一格并获得 +1 [img:shield]。

description2_texts.en:
Move one tile and gain +1 [img:shield].
This spell costs 0 mana the first time you cast it each turn.
description2_texts.zh:
移动一格并获得 +1 [img:shield]。
此法术每回合首次施放时消耗为0。

abilities.description:
Dash forward X spaces, gain +X [img:shield], deal X damage, and deal X knockback.
X is equal to the number of empty armor slots you have plus one.
abilities.description_2:
Dash forward X spaces, gain +X [img:shield], deal X damage, and deal X knockback.
X is equal to twice the number of empty armor slots you have.

description_texts.en:
Dash forward X spaces, gain +X [img:shield], deal X damage, and deal X knockback.
X is equal to the number of empty armor slots you have plus one.
description_texts.zh:
向前冲刺X格，获得+X [img:shield]，
造成X点伤害，并造成X点击退。

X等于你空装备槽数量加一。

description2_texts.en:
Dash forward X spaces, gain +X [img:shield], deal X damage, and deal X knockback.
X is equal to twice the number of empty armor slots you have.
description2_texts.zh:
向前冲刺X格，获得+X [img:shield]，
造成X点伤害，并造成X点击退。

X等于你空装备槽数量的两倍。

abilities.description: Summon a 1 HP illusion of yourself within three tiles that mimics your basic attack, but in the opposite direction of you. It dies at the end of your turn.
abilities.description_2: Summon a 1 HP illusion of yourself on any tile that mimics your basic attack, but in the opposite direction of you. It dies at the end of your turn.

description_texts.en: Summon a 1 HP illusion of yourself within three tiles that mimics your basic attack, but in the opposite direction of you. It dies at the end of your turn.
description_texts.zh:
在3格内召唤一个拥有1生命值的幻影，

模仿你的基础攻击，
但方向与你相反。
它会在你的回合结束时消失。

description2_texts.en: Summon a 1 HP illusion of yourself on any tile that mimics your basic attack, but in the opposite direction of you. It dies at the end of your turn.
description2_texts.zh:
在任意格子上召唤一个拥有1生命值的幻影，

模仿你的基础攻击，
但方向与你相反。
它会在你的回合结束时消失。

abilities.description: Teleport next to a random enemy, then switch to melee stance and automatically attack it.
abilities.description_2: Teleport next to a random enemy, then switch to melee stance and automatically attack it. This has a chance to repeat multiple times.

description_texts.en: Teleport next to a random enemy, then switch to melee stance and automatically attack it.
description_texts.zh:
传送到随机敌人旁边，
然后切换到近战姿态并自动攻击它。

description2_texts.en: Teleport next to a random enemy, then switch to melee stance and automatically attack it. This has a chance to repeat multiple times.
description2_texts.zh:
传送到随机敌人旁边，
然后切换到近战姿态并自动攻击它。

此技能有可能重复多次。

abilities.description:
Gain +1 [img:int] and +1 [img:shield].
If you have 7 or more [img:shield], this spell costs 1 mana less.
abilities.description_2:
Gain +1 [img:int] and +2 [img:shield].
If you have 7 or more [img:shield], this spell costs 1 mana less.

description_texts.en:
Gain +1 [img:int] and +1 [img:shield].
If you have 7 or more [img:shield], this spell costs 1 mana less.
description_texts.zh:
获得+1 [img:int] 和 +1 [img:shield]。
如果你有7个或更多 [img:shield]，
该法术消耗法力值减少1。

description2_texts.en:
Gain +1 [img:int] and +2 [img:shield].
If you have 7 or more [img:shield], this spell costs 1 mana less.
description2_texts.zh:
获得+1 [img:int] 和 +2 [img:shield]。
如果你有7个或更多 [img:shield]，
该法术消耗法力值减少1。

abilities.description:
You can't cast spells for the rest of the battle.
For the rest of the battle, whenever you kill an enemy, take an extra turn.
abilities.description_2:
You can't cast spells for the rest of the battle.
For the rest of the battle, whenever you kill an enemy, take an extra turn.
Get an extra turn when you cast this.

description_texts.en:
You can't cast spells for the rest of the battle.
For the rest of the battle, whenever you kill an enemy, take an extra turn.
description_texts.zh:
你在本场战斗剩余时间内无法施放法术。

在战斗剩余时间内，
每当你击杀一个敌人，
获得一个额外回合。

description2_texts.en:
You can't cast spells for the rest of the battle.
For the rest of the battle, whenever you kill an enemy, take an extra turn.
Get an extra turn when you cast this.
description2_texts.zh:
你在本场战斗剩余时间内无法施放法术。

在战斗剩余时间内，
每当你击杀一个敌人，
获得一个额外回合。
释放时立刻获得一个额外回合。

abilities.description: Teleport exactly two tiles away, then switch stances.
abilities.description_2: Teleport two to four tiles away, then switch stances.

description_texts.en: Teleport exactly two tiles away, then switch stances.
description_texts.zh:
传送至相邻两格位置，
然后切换姿态。

description2_texts.en: Teleport two to four tiles away, then switch stances.
description2_texts.zh:
传送两到四格远，
然后切换姿态。

abilities.description: Until end of turn, your basic attack emits +1 Sparkle.
abilities.description_2:
Until end of turn, your basic attack emits +1 Sparkle.
Refresh your basic attack.

description_texts.en: Until end of turn, your basic attack emits +1 Sparkle.
description_texts.zh:
直到回合结束，
你的基础攻击会附加+1 火花。

description2_texts.en:
Until end of turn, your basic attack emits +1 Sparkle.
Refresh your basic attack.
description2_texts.zh:
直到回合结束，
你的基础攻击会附加+1 火花。

刷新你的基础攻击。

abilities.description_2: Summon a half-sized copy of yourself with half your stats. It's AI-controlled and CAN use spells.

description_texts.en: Summon a half-sized copy of yourself with half your stats. It's AI-controlled and can't use spells.

召唤一个半身大小、
拥有一半属性的你自己的复制体。

abilities.description_2: Explode a body and spawn 5 Leeches.

abilities.description_2: Resurrect a body to full HP. It becomes a Zombie and joins your team.

复活一个尸体至一半生命值。

abilities.description_2: Teleport into a body, destroying it to heal 4 HP and gain All Stats Up.

摧毁它以回复4生命值并获得全属性提升。

abilities.description_2:

Deal 1 damage to all units.

对所有单位造成1点伤害。

abilities.description_2: Give a unit Weakness 5 and All Stats Down.

description_texts.zh:
摧毁一个相邻的身体。

abilities.description_2: Inflict Fear 1 and Weakness 2 on all enemies.

description_texts.en: Inflict Fear on all enemies.
description_texts.zh: 对所有敌人造成恐惧。

description2_texts.en: Inflict Fear 1 and Weakness 2 on all enemies.
description2_texts.zh: 对所有敌人造成1层恐惧和2层虚弱。

abilities.description: Inflict Soul Link on units in an area.
abilities.description_2: Inflict Soul Link on units in a large area.

description2_texts.en: Inflict Soul Link on units in a large area.

abilities.description: Inflict Soul Link on yourself and every enemy.

description_texts.en: Inflict Soul Link on yourself and every enemy.

对你自己和每个敌人施加灵魂链接。

获得+2 [img:con] 并恢复8生命值。

abilities.description_2: Take 1 damage, heal all allies 1 HP and give them +1 mana.

友1点生命值并给予他们+1法力值。

abilities.description_2: Resurrect an enemy body to full HP. It joins your team and takes an extra turn after this one.

description2_texts.en: Resurrect an enemy body to full HP. It joins your team and takes an extra turn after this one.

description2_texts.zh:
传送到敌人前方，
然后对每个相邻单位造成击退4和恐惧效果。

abilities.description: Give a unit +1 [img:con] and heal it 4 HP. You gain -1 [img:con] and lose 4 health.
abilities.description_2:
Give a unit +1 [img:con] and heal it 4 HP. You gain -1 [img:con] and lose 4 health.
This spell can revive units. If the unit revived was an enemy it gets charmed for the battle.

description_texts.en: Give a unit +1 [img:con] and heal it 4 HP. You gain -1 [img:con] and lose 4 health.
description_texts.zh:
给予一个单位+1 [img:con] 并治疗其4点生命值。

你获得-1 [img:con] 并失去4点生命值。

Give a unit +1 [img:con] and heal it 4 HP. You gain -1 [img:con] and lose 4 health.
This spell can revive units. If the unit revived was an enemy it gets charmed for the battle.
description2_texts.zh:
给予一个单位+1 [img:con] 并治疗其4点生命值。

它将被魅惑于该战斗中。

abilities.description: Deal 2 damage to yourself.

abilities.description_2: Inflict Fear 1 and Madness 2 on a unit in range 4.

abilities.description_2:
Spawn a shadow copy of yourself that fades after its second turn.
[s:.7](The copy can't cast this ability or give extra turns to units.)[/s]

Spawn a shadow copy of yourself that fades after its first turn.

description_texts.zh: 传送到一个空地格。

abilities.description_2: Take damage equal to half of your max HP, then deal that much damage and inflict Fear 2 on units in an area.

description_texts.en: Take damage equal to half of your max HP, then deal that much damage and inflict Fear 2 on another unit.
description_texts.zh:
承受相当于最大生命值一半的伤害，

然后对另一个单位造成等量伤害并施加2层恐惧。

description2_texts.en: Take damage equal to half of your max HP, then deal that much damage and inflict Fear 2 on units in an area.
description2_texts.zh:
承受相当于最大生命值一半的伤害，

然后对区域内单位造成等量伤害并施加2层恐惧。

abilities.description:
Down yourself. You don't get injured. Spawn a shadow copy of yourself that fades after its first turn.
[s:.7]The copy can't cast this ability or give extra turns to units.[/s]
abilities.description_2:
Down yourself. You don't get injured. Spawn a shadow copy of yourself that fades after its first turn.
[s:.7]The copy can't cast this ability or give extra turns to units.[/s]
[s:.7](This spell costs 0 mana.)[/s]

description_texts.en:
Down yourself. You don't get injured. Spawn a shadow copy of yourself that fades after its first turn.
[s:.7]The copy can't cast this ability or give extra turns to units.[/s]
description_texts.zh:
使自己倒地。并且不会重伤。
生成你的一个影子复制体，
该复制体在其第一个回合后消失。

[s:.7]复制体无法施放此技能或给予单位额外回合。
[/s]

description2_texts.en:
Down yourself. You don't get injured. Spawn a shadow copy of yourself that fades after its first turn.
[s:.7]The copy can't cast this ability or give extra turns to units.[/s]

abilities.description: Teleport into a familiar and destroy it. Refresh your basic attack.
abilities.description_2: Teleport into a familiar and destroy it. Refresh your basic attack and heal 5 HP.

description_texts.en: Teleport into a familiar and destroy it. Refresh your basic attack.
description_texts.zh:
传送到一个宠物并摧毁它。
刷新你的普通攻击。

description2_texts.en: Teleport into a familiar and destroy it. Refresh your basic attack and heal 5 HP.
description2_texts.zh:

abilities.description_2:

任意位置。

abilities.description: Spend all of your mana, then drain that much HP from an adjacent unit. Ignores shield.
abilities.description_2: Spend all of your mana, then drain that much HP from a unit in range 3. Ignores shield.

description_texts.en: Spend all of your mana, then drain that much HP from an adjacent unit. Ignores shield.
description_texts.zh:
消耗你所有的法力值，
然后从一个相邻单位吸取同等的生命值。

无视护盾。

description2_texts.en: Spend all of your mana, then drain that much HP from a unit in range 3. Ignores shield.
description2_texts.zh:
消耗你所有的法力值，
然后从3格范围内的单位吸取同等的生命值。

无视护盾。

移除另一个单位的所有状态效果，

abilities.description: Deal damage and inflict Weakness on an adjacent unit. If you have no weapon, equip a bone.

如果你没有武器，

如果你没有武器，则装备一根骨头。

蒸发你视线内格子上的一切。
对Boss目标则造成伤害并施加眩晕。

description2_texts.en: Vaporize everything on a tile within your line of sight. Against a boss, this deals massive damage and inflicts Stun instead.
description2_texts.zh:
蒸发你视线内格子上的一切。
对Boss目标则造成巨大伤害并施加眩晕。

abilities.description: Every ally that hasn't taken their turn yet takes their turn right after yours. You go first next round.
abilities.description_2: Every ally that hasn't taken their turn yet takes their turn right after yours. Those units get +4 temporary [img:spd]. You go first next round.

description_texts.en: Every ally that hasn't taken their turn yet takes their turn right after yours. You go first next round.
description_texts.zh:
每个尚未轮到行动的盟友会在你之后立即行动。

你在下一回合先行。

description2_texts.en: Every ally that hasn't taken their turn yet takes their turn right after yours. Those units get +4 temporary [img:spd]. You go first next round.
description2_texts.zh:
每个尚未轮到行动的盟友会在你之后立即行动。

那些单位获得+4临时[img:spd]。
你在下一回合先行。

abilities.description: Upgrade one of your spells at random for the rest of the battle.
abilities.description_2: Target yourself or a unit within your line of sight and upgrade one of their spells at random for the rest of the battle.

description_texts.en: Upgrade one of your spells at random for the rest of the battle.
description_texts.zh: 在接下来的战斗中随机升级你的一项法术。

description2_texts.en: Target yourself or a unit within your line of sight and upgrade one of their spells at random for the rest of the battle.
description2_texts.zh:
选择你自己或视线范围内的单位，

随机升级他们的一项法术，
效果持续整个战斗。

abilities.description: Deal damage to a unit in your line of sight, then increase this spell's damage by 1 for the rest of the battle.
abilities.description_2:
Deal damage to a unit in your line of sight, then increase this spell's damage by 1 for the rest of the battle.
[s:.7](This spell costs less.)[/s]

description_texts.en: Deal damage to a unit in your line of sight, then increase this spell's damage by 1 for the rest of the battle.
description_texts.zh:
对视线内的一个单位造成伤害，
然后在接下来的战斗中提升该法术的伤害1点。

Deal damage to a unit in your line of sight, then increase this spell's damage by 1 for the rest of the battle.
[s:.7](This spell costs less.)[/s]
description2_texts.zh:
对视线内的一个单位造成伤害，
然后在接下来的战斗中提升该法术的伤害1点。

abilities.description: Spawn a friendly illusion of a random unit that fades away after one turn.
abilities.description_2: Spawn a friendly illusion of a random unit that fades away after one turn. The illusion gets +4 [img:spd] and +2 Damage.

description_texts.en: Spawn a friendly illusion of a random unit that fades away after one turn.
description_texts.zh:
召唤一个随机单位的友方幻象，
该幻象在一回合后消失。

description2_texts.zh:
召唤一个随机单位的友方幻象，
该幻象在一回合后消失。
幻象获得+4[img:spd]和+2伤害。

abilities.description: Every enemy in your line of sight takes an extra turn. They are charmed on that turn.
abilities.description_2:
Every enemy in your line of sight takes an extra turn. They are charmed on that turn.
[s:.7](This spell costs less.)[/s]

description_texts.en: Every enemy in your line of sight takes an extra turn. They are charmed on that turn.

你视线内的所有敌人获得额外一次行动。

他们在该回合被魅惑。

description2_texts.en:
Every enemy in your line of sight takes an extra turn. They are charmed on that turn.
[s:.7](This spell costs less.)[/s]
description2_texts.zh:
你视线内的所有敌人获得额外一次行动。

他们在该回合被魅惑。

abilities.description:
Take an extra turn. You're stunned and don't regenerate mana on that turn.
[s:.7](This spell can't be cast on extra turns.)[/s]
abilities.description_2:
Take an extra turn. You have a 75% chance to be stunned and don't regenerate mana on that turn.
[s:.7](This spell can't be cast on extra turns.)[/s]

description_texts.en:
Take an extra turn. You're stunned and don't regenerate mana on that turn.
[s:.7](This spell can't be cast on extra turns.)[/s]
description_texts.zh:
获得额外一次行动。
但你眩晕且该回合不回复法力值。

[s:.7](该法术无法在额外回合施放。)[/s]

description2_texts.en:
Take an extra turn. You have a 75% chance to be stunned and don't regenerate mana on that turn.
[s:.7](This spell can't be cast on extra turns.)[/s]
description2_texts.zh:
获得额外一次行动。
有75%的概率被眩晕且该回合不回复法力值。

[s:.7](该法术无法在额外回合施放。)[/s]

abilities.description: Inflict Magic Weakness 2 on all units in your line of sight.
abilities.description_2: Inflict Magic Weakness 2 and Confusion 1 on all non-allied units in your line of sight.

description_texts.en: Inflict Magic Weakness 2 on all units in your line of sight.
description_texts.zh: 对你视线内的所有单位施加2层魔法虚弱。

description2_texts.en: Inflict Magic Weakness 2 and Confusion 1 on all non-allied units in your line of sight.
description2_texts.zh:
对所有你视线内的非盟友单位施
加2层魔法虚弱
和1层困惑。

abilities.description:
Revive all bodies, fully heal all units, and clear all status effects.
[s:.7](This spell can be cast only once per battle.)[/s]
abilities.description_2:
Revive all bodies, fully heal all units, and clear all status effects.
Castable while you're downed. It costs 0 mana if you're downed.
[s:.7](This spell can be cast only once per battle.)[/s]

description_texts.en:
Revive all bodies, fully heal all units, and clear all status effects.
[s:.7](This spell can be cast only once per battle.)[/s]
description_texts.zh:
复活所有尸体，
完全治疗所有单位，
并清除所有状态效果。
[s:.7](此法术每场战斗只能施放一次。)[/s]

description2_texts.en:
Revive all bodies, fully heal all units, and clear all status effects.
Castable while you're downed. It costs 0 mana if you're downed.
[s:.7](This spell can be cast only once per battle.)[/s]

复活所有尸体，
完全治疗所有单位，
并清除所有状态效果。倒地时可施放。
如果你倒地，消耗0法力值。
[s:.7](此法术每场战斗只能施放一次。)[/s]

abilities.description: Target an allied cat within your line of sight. Cast one of their spells at random for free (or use their basic attack if theres no good spells).
abilities.description_2:
Target an allied cat within your line of sight. Cast one of their spells at random for free (or use their basic attack if theres no good spells).
[s:.7](This spell costs less.)[/s]

随机免费施放它们的一项法术

则使用它们的基础攻击）。

description2_texts.en:
Target an allied cat within your line of sight. Cast one of their spells at random for free (or use their basic attack if theres no good spells).

abilities.description: Swap positions with a random unit.
abilities.description_2: Swap positions with a random unit. If that unit was an enemy, you inflict Confusion on it.

description_texts.en: Swap positions with a random unit.
description_texts.zh: 与一个随机单位交换位置。

与一个随机单位交换位置。
如果该单位是敌人，
将对其施加困惑。

abilities.description: Make an asteroid fall onto a tile within your line of sight. The asteroid deals damage and leaves a rock.
abilities.description_2: Make an asteroid fall onto a tile within your line of sight. The asteroid deals damage, bruises and leaves a boulder.

description_texts.en: Make an asteroid fall onto a tile within your line of sight. The asteroid deals damage and leaves a rock.
description_texts.zh:
使一块小行星坠落到你视线内的一个格子上。

小行星造成伤害并留下岩石。

description2_texts.en: Make an asteroid fall onto a tile within your line of sight. The asteroid deals damage, bruises and leaves a boulder.
description2_texts.zh:
使一块小行星坠落到你视线内的一个格子上。

小行星造成伤害，
造成瘀伤并留下巨石。

abilities.description: Inflict Freeze on a unit within your line of sight.
abilities.description_2: Inflict Freeze 1, Blind 2, and Confusion 2 on a unit within your line of sight.

description_texts.en: Inflict Freeze on a unit within your line of sight.
description_texts.zh: 对你视线内的单位施加冻结。

description2_texts.zh:
对你视线内的单位施加1层冻结、

2层致盲和2层困惑。

abilities.description:
Give a unit within your line of sight an extra turn immediately, then end your turn. 
Castable only if you haven't taken any actions this turn.
[s:.7](This can't be cast on extra turns.)[/s]
abilities.description_2:
Give a unit within your line of sight an extra turn immediately, then end your turn.
Castable only if you haven't taken any actions this turn other than your movement action.
[s:.7](This can't be cast on extra turns.)[/s]

description_texts.en:
Give a unit within your line of sight an extra turn immediately, then end your turn. 
Castable only if you haven't taken any actions this turn.
[s:.7](This can't be cast on extra turns.)[/s]
description_texts.zh:
立即给予你视线内的单位一个额外回合，

然后结束你的回合。
仅在本回合未采取任何行动时可施放。
[s:.7](此法术不能在额外回合中施放。)[/s]

description2_texts.en:
Give a unit within your line of sight an extra turn immediately, then end your turn.
Castable only if you haven't taken any actions this turn other than your movement action.
[s:.7](This can't be cast on extra turns.)[/s]

立即给予你视线内的单位一个额外回合，

然后结束你的回合。

abilities.description:
Restore all of your mana and fall asleep.

abilities.description_2:
Restore all of your mana and fall asleep.

Restore all of your mana and fall asleep.

abilities.description: Force an enemy within your line of sight to attack in the direction it's facing.
abilities.description_2: Force a unit within your line of sight to attack in the direction it's facing.

description_texts.en: Force an enemy within your line of sight to attack in the direction it's facing.
description_texts.zh: 强迫你视线内的敌人向其面朝方向攻击。

abilities.description: Every unit within your line of sight turns away from you.
abilities.description_2: Every unit within your line of sight turns away from you and is inflicted with Blind 1.

description2_texts.zh: 你视线内的所有单位都会转过身去并受到致盲1。

abilities.description: Deal 10 Knockback to adjacent units. If you cast this from full mana, the units take 10 damage on collision.
abilities.description_2: Deal 10 Knockback to adjacent units. If you cast this from full mana, the units take 10 damage on collision and get stunned.

description_texts.en: Deal 10 Knockback to adjacent units. If you cast this from full mana, the units take 10 damage on collision.

对相邻单位造成10点击退。
如果从满法力值施放，
单位在碰撞时受到10点伤害。

description2_texts.en: Deal 10 Knockback to adjacent units. If you cast this from full mana, the units take 10 damage on collision and get stunned.

对相邻单位造成10点击退。
如果从满法力值施放，
单位在碰撞时受到10点伤害并陷入眩晕。

abilities.description: Inflict Slow 1 on a unit within your line of sight. If you cast this from full mana, instead inflict Immobilize 1 and deal 6 damage.
abilities.description_2: Inflict Slow 1 on each unit in an area around a tile within your line of sight. If you cast this from full mana, instead inflict Immobilize 1 and deal 6 damage.

description_texts.en: Inflict Slow 1 on a unit within your line of sight. If you cast this from full mana, instead inflict Immobilize 1 and deal 6 damage.

对你视线内的单位施加1层减速。

对你视线内某格周围区域的每个
单位施加1层减速。
如果以满法力值施放，
改为施加1层定身并造成6点伤害。

abilities.description_2: Teleport into a unit within your line of sight. Deal damage and displace it.

abilities.description_2: Deal damage with Knockback 4, Chain Knockback and inflict Bruise 1 in a cone.

description2_texts.zh:
与视线范围内的单位交换位置。

abilities.description: Teleport to the last tile you targeted with an ability if it's empty.
abilities.description_2: Teleport to the last tile you targeted with an ability. Displace and damage any units on that tile.

abilities.description_2: Dash up to five tiles in a straight line or diagonally. Leave floating glass shards on tiles you pass through.

description_texts.zh:
向直线或斜线方向冲刺最多三格。

经过的格子上留下漂浮的玻璃碎片。

description2_texts.en: Dash up to five tiles in a straight line or diagonally. Leave floating glass shards on tiles you pass through.

向直线或斜线方向冲刺最多五格。

经过的格子上留下漂浮的玻璃碎片。

abilities.description_2:
A melee attack that inflicts Stun.

abilities.description: Heal yourself.
abilities.description_2: Heal yourself more.

description2_texts.en: Heal yourself more.

abilities.description_2: A melee attack with Lifesteal that inflicts Bleed 2 and ignores shield.

一次带有吸血效果的近战攻击，

abilities.description_2: Grab a unit in front of you and slam it into the tile behind you, inflicting Bruise 3 and Immobile.

抓住你面前的单位，

abilities.description: Throw an adjacent unit to an open tile.
abilities.description_2: Throw an adjacent unit to a tile, dealing bonus damage if it collides with something.

description_texts.en: Throw an adjacent unit to an open tile.
description_texts.zh: 将相邻单位掷向一个空格子。

description2_texts.en: Throw an adjacent unit to a tile, dealing bonus damage if it collides with something.
description2_texts.zh:
将相邻单位掷向一个格子，
如果碰撞到物体则造成额外伤害。

abilities.description: Jump to a tile and Immobilize anything you land on.
abilities.description_2: Jump to a tile and Immobilize units in an area.

description_texts.en: Jump to a tile and Immobilize anything you land on.
description_texts.zh: 跳到一个格子并定身你落脚的目标。

description2_texts.en: Jump to a tile and Immobilize units in an area.
description2_texts.zh: 跳到一个格子并定身一个区域内的单位。

abilities.description: Dash forward with Trample, then spawn a rock.
abilities.description_2: Dash forward with Trample, then spawn a rock. Deals more damage and has a 20% chance to inflict Stun.

description_texts.en: Dash forward with Trample, then spawn a rock.
description_texts.zh:
向前冲刺造成践踏伤害，
然后生成一块岩石。

description2_texts.en: Dash forward with Trample, then spawn a rock. Deals more damage and has a 20% chance to inflict Stun.
description2_texts.zh:
向前冲刺造成践踏伤害，
然后生成一块岩石。
造成更多伤害并有20%几率使目标眩晕。

abilities.description: Swap positions with any ally.
abilities.description_2: Swap positions with any unit.

description_texts.en: Swap positions with any ally.
description_texts.zh: 与任意盟友交换位置。

description2_texts.en: Swap positions with any unit.
description2_texts.zh: 与任何单位交换位置。

abilities.description: Jump to a tile adjacent to an ally. Damage and displace any units you land on.
abilities.description_2: Jump to a tile adjacent to an ally. Damage and displace any units you land on, or are adjacent to.

description_texts.en: Jump to a tile adjacent to an ally. Damage and displace any units you land on.
description_texts.zh:
跳到一个邻近盟友的格子。
对你落脚的任何单位造成伤害并驱散它们。

description2_texts.en: Jump to a tile adjacent to an ally. Damage and displace any units you land on, or are adjacent to.
description2_texts.zh:
跳到一个邻近盟友的格子。
对你落脚或邻近的任何单位造成伤害并驱散它们。

abilities.description: Hit all adjacent units, then spawn a rock.
abilities.description_2: Hit all adjacent and diagonally adjacent units, then spawn a rock.

description_texts.en: Hit all adjacent units, then spawn a rock.
description_texts.zh:

然后生成一块岩石。

description2_texts.en: Hit all adjacent and diagonally adjacent units, then spawn a rock.
description2_texts.zh:

然后生成一块岩石。

abilities.description:

abilities.description_2:

[s:.7](This spell spawns rocks.)[/s]

Deal damage in a cone with a 10% chance to Petrify. Has a chance to spawn rocks.

有机会生成岩石。

description2_texts.en:
Deal more damage in a cone with a 20% chance to Petrify. Has a chance to spawn rocks.

description2_texts.en: Throw a rock with a 33% chance to Stun.

abilities.description:
Give a unit +5 Thorns until your next turn.

abilities.description_2:

Give a unit +5 Thorns until your next turn.

abilities.description: Trample over one tile diagonally.

abilities.description: Knock 2 enemies in front of you together.

description_texts.zh: 一起击退面前的2个敌人。

description2_texts.en: Knock 2 enemies in front of you together with +2 knockback damage.
description2_texts.zh:

abilities.description: Levitate all rocks. They will automatically fling towards enemies that end movement in line with them.
abilities.description_2:
Levitate all rocks. They will automatically fling towards enemies that end movement in line with them.
[s:.7](This spell costs less.)[/s]

description_texts.zh:
使所有岩石漂浮。
它们会自动向移动结束时与其在
一条线上的敌人投掷。

description2_texts.en:
Levitate all rocks. They will automatically fling towards enemies that end movement in line with them.
[s:.7](This spell costs less.)[/s]
description2_texts.zh:
使所有岩石漂浮。
它们会自动向移动结束时与其在一条线上的

abilities.description: Jump on top of a rock, exploding it. Deal damage and knock back all adjacent units.
abilities.description_2: Jump on top of a rock, exploding it. Deal high damage and knock back all adjacent units.

description_texts.en: Jump on top of a rock, exploding it. Deal damage and knock back all adjacent units.

跳上岩石并使其爆炸。

abilities.description: The next time an ally is targeted by an enemy, switch places with that ally.
abilities.description_2: The next time an ally is targeted by an enemy, switch places with that ally and gain +4 [img:shield].

description_texts.en: The next time an ally is targeted by an enemy, switch places with that ally.

下次当盟友被敌人攻击时，
与该盟友交换位置。

description2_texts.en: The next time an ally is targeted by an enemy, switch places with that ally and gain +4 [img:shield].
description2_texts.zh:

abilities.description: Dash 3 tiles, damage, inflict Bruise and throw what you hit towards your original tile.
abilities.description_2: Dash 10 tiles, damage, inflict Bruise and throw what you hit towards your original tile.

description_texts.en: Dash 3 tiles, damage, inflict Bruise and throw what you hit towards your original tile.

description2_texts.en: Dash 10 tiles, damage, inflict Bruise and throw what you hit towards your original tile.

冲刺10格，造成伤害，

abilities.description: Pull a unit within 2 tiles towards you, knocking it into you.

At 0 [img:spd], this spell is Castable once per turn.)[/s]
abilities.description_2:
Jump up to 4 tiles away, damage units you land on, then gain -1 [img:spd].
If your [img:spd] is 0, this has increased range and damage.
[s:.7](This spell's mana cost is equal to your [img:spd].
At 0 [img:spd], this spell is Castable once per turn.)[/s]

Jump up to 3 tiles away, damage units you land on, then gain -1 [img:spd].
[s:.7](This spell's mana cost is equal to your [img:spd].

abilities.description:
Dash forward one tile and attack with Knockback.

Gain +6 [img:shield] and -1 [img:spd].

Gain +5 [img:shield] and -1 [img:spd].

abilities.description: Dash forward up to 3 tiles, gain +4 [img:shield] then damage and knock back adjacent units.
abilities.description_2: Dash forward up to 10 tiles, gain +4 [img:shield] then damage and knock back adjacent units with +5 knockback damage.

description_texts.en: Dash forward up to 3 tiles, gain +4 [img:shield] then damage and knock back adjacent units.
description_texts.zh:

abilities.description: Toss a unit to an empty tile within 3 tiles of you, then your allies attack it if they can.
abilities.description_2: Toss a unit to an empty tile within 6 tiles of you and inflict Bruise, then your allies attack it if they can.

description_texts.en: Toss a unit to an empty tile within 3 tiles of you, then your allies attack it if they can.
description_texts.zh:
将一个单位掷到距离你最多 3 格的空格，

然后你的盟友若能攻击该单位，

然后你的盟友如果能攻击它，

abilities.description: All units on dirt tiles get tossed to random nearby tiles and take damage when they land.

All units on dirt tiles get tossed to random tiles and take damage when they land.
